## What are you requesting?
Describe the asset clearly (size, format, purpose).

## Intended Use
Where will this asset be used? (PFP, banner, embed, etc.)

## Requirements
- Size:
- Format (PNG, SVG, WebP, etc.):
- Transparency needed? (Yes/No)

## Does this preserve the existing message?
- [ ] Yes
- [ ] No (If no, this will likely be rejected)

## Additional Notes
Anything else that helps clarify the request.
